hero_title: LyricLAB is a small corner of the web focused on building bespoke websites and modern brands.
hero_subtitle:
LyricLAB loves Statamic!
Statamic is our preferred Content Management System built on top of the Laravel framework. And we've fallen in love with what Statamic can do, not only for us as developers, but also for content authors who have complex or highly-structured sites.
